A Reader Of News I wonder whither there be'est any new PC games on sale this week, perchance?
Enter A News Editor, With Alarums And Excursions
Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sunday is cancelled. Book for now!
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Solipsism Xtreme Edition

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
It's official: I am once again the Sunday correspondent around here. That means it falls to me to round up (mostly) good (mostly) writing about (mostly) video games. I will otherwise be spending my Sunday continuing the fight against my dog's fleas, which rebound every three weeks no matter how much I spray, scrub or throw things away.  
On, the independent video game magazine which I linked to last week, has run a series of brief interviews with each of the contributors to its launch issue. I recommend Christian Donlan's for the puzzle game recommendations and Margaret Robertson's which expands on her fascination with Japanese paper games.

 
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
BioWare currently has no plans for Dragon Age: The Veilguard expansions, according to reports. Instead the studio will support the fantasy RPG with smaller updates and otherwise turn their full attention towards Mass Effect 5.

 
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard won't get expansions, reports say, as BioWare move to the next Mass Effect

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The Elder Scrolls: Legends, the free-to-play card game set in Bethesda's fantasy world, has been removed from sale on Steam. Its servers will shut down for good on January 30th, 2025, after which it will no longer be playable. The closure comes five years after the game was last updated.

 
Read more
articles.title: Elder Scrolls: Legends has been removed from sale and will become unplayable in January 2025

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Typing Of The Dead released in arcades 25 years ago remains a masterpiece - funny, absurd, tense, and novel. I am keen on any game that aims to follow in its footsteps, and there are a few. The latest is Blood Typers, a horror game where you tippity-tap on your keyboard to fight montsters in a spooky mansion, but this isn't a rail shooter, so you'll be typing to explore and navigate, too.

It's now got a release of February 2025, and there's a demo you can play now.

 
Read more
articles.title: Typing Of The Dead meets Resident Evil with co-op in Blood Typers, which has a demo you can play now

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Okay, look folks, I'm terribly sorry you've been trapped in the bubble of silence for this weekend while comments are still un-fucking themselves. I'm expecting some really juicy catch-up comments next weekend! In the meantime, this post will stay up as usual so you can at least hear what we're getting up to in the treehouse.
Congratulations on making it to another checkpoint, fellow traveller. Please spend your hard-earned coin on one of the following bonuses: either a weekend of games but no sleep; a weekend of sleep but no games; or a weekend of health and activity but nothing to post in the comments below? Your choice! Here's what we're all clicking on this weekend.
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Like a plague doctor delicately administering another handful of leeches, Ice Pick Lodge have shared a bit more about the recently announced Pathologic 3, explaining how their plans for the cult epidemic-battling series have progressed since the release of Pathologic 2.
Read more
articles.title: Pathologic 3 devs keen to avoid "premature promises" about bringing back the Changeling in Pathologic 4

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
People have asked me, a Call Of Duty liker, "How's the new COD?" - such is the mass appeal of Call Of Duty that even a lot of my non-industry pals are invested in whether Black Ops 6's shooty really does bang. And every single time my brain clunks into gear and I turn inwards, where I struggle to come up with anything meaningful to say. So much so that a fog develops and out of the fog emerges a figure - it's me. I'm holding an M4A1 with an extended barrel and a vertical foregrip. My brain and body perform a pincer movement of physical response: 1) I shrug 2) I say, "It's like Call Of Duty".
Read more
articles.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 multiplayer review: it's like Call Of Duty

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
There’s plenty that you could justifiably expect from a Bioware RPG: chats with mates, opportunities to get those mates horribly killed, surviving mates turning to the side then walking offscreen. But I don’t think anyone expected Dragon Age: The Veilguard to be, at least on a purely technical level, one of the smoothest-performing, settings-rich AAA PC releases of the year so far.
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard on PC is the surprise AAA tech success of 2024

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Stroll on down to Uncle Capcom's garage, girls and boys, because it's time to meddle with a cat's voicebox, ride a combat peacock and meticulously injure a vast, blubbery teddybear. By which I mean, the Monster Hunter Wilds beta is now live on Steam through to 4th November at 2.59am GMT. That's 2.59am sharp. If you're hurrying along at 3am on Monday absolutely desperate to polish the aesthetics of a small enslaved catperson, you can sod off and play Dragon Age: The Veilguard instead.
 
Read more
articles.title: The Monster Hunter Wilds beta is live with an early glimpse of the new camping, wound and weather systems

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Remedy's Alan Wake 2 has now "recouped most of its development and marketing expenses", CEO Tero Virtala has announced in a business review for January-September 2024. Speaking as somebody who would quite like there to be more Alan Wake games - or at least, moderately weird and pretty decent blockbuster singleplayer horror games - I am both pleased by this news and a little troubled that Remedy's eldritch forest fable (which came out in October 2023) has yet to break even.

 
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2 still hasn't quite made its money back, according to Remedy's latest financials

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Some days, I wonder if every word written before a trailer is actually superfluous. It’s a visual medium, after all. What can a description achieve save to clumsily gesture at the true shape of something; a dog-eared tour brochure for a thrilling weekend spelunking in Plato’s cave? I can usually shake this feeling, but gory zombie action game Showa American Story is my breaking point. There is nothing I can impart about this thing that will not be conveyed better by allowing its new trailer to wash over you like a tide of sheer videogame. Here’s it:
Read more
articles.title: Showa American Story is Yakuza: Dead Souls meets Tokyo Gore Police, and it looks incredible

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Real gamblers play russian roulette with shotguns. That is the core concept of Buckshot Roulette, the Inscryption-looking game of blinksweat and bulletworry. It's been out for a while now but the developers have just added a fun extra - a 4-person multiplayer mode. 
Read more
articles.title: Buckshot Roulette now has a 4-person multiplayer mode, which I'm sure you will survive

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Some extremely fresh vintage workwear that I bought for entirely practical reasons aside, I’m not exactly a fashion person. I have nobody to impress most days but my cat, and the only item of clothing she appears to have an opinion on is my Oodie, which is very comfortable for both of us and also smells like a chicken shop, which I imagine is more pleasant for her than me.
This aside, I found myself taking a whole bunch of Dragon Age: The Veilguard screenshots as I played just to capture the RPG’s various outfits. They are ridiculous. Incredibly intricate and detailed, as well as being obscenely impractical for the most part. I do not like any of them in the sense I would wear them, but I like all of them in the sense that they display artists allowed to run free like caffeinated weasels and indulge their every whim.
Read more
articles.title: I am deeply enamoured by Dragon Age: The Veilguard's intricate and ridiculous fashion design

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
The Steam Deck is something of a talisman for gaming on Linux, its popularity and penguin-powered SteamOS having almost singlehandedly dragged it past MacOS as the second-most-used operating system among Steam users. Sadly, this also means the Valve handheld is the primary casualty when developers decide to stop bothering with Linux support, as Respawn Entertainment have decided to do for Apex Legends.
Read more
articles.title: Respawn have killed Apex Legends' Steam Deck support in the name of anti-cheat

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
You remember Lucas Pope, right? He who casually dropped two of the most influential puzzle games ever then got distracted by yellow cranks for six years, occasionally popping up to drop a demake of Papers Please? Well, Pope has ceased hogging that crank, for now at least, and just released Haloween-y adventure game Moida Mansion. It’s on Itch here, and it’s completely free to play in your browser.
Read more
articles.title: Moida Mansion is the new free game from Return Of The Obra Dinn’s Lucas Pope, and it's out now

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Part of the fun of Dragon Age's fantasy is that it's inconsistent - or at least, inconsistent by the standards of fantasy RPGs, which often break down into a million neatly organised and interlocking codex entries. It all rides on who you speak to. The humans believe one thing about the origins and workings of Thedas, the elves another, the qunari something else entirely. These differences are the basis for many factional disagreements and thus, many core series plot developments. According to former lead writer David Gaider, however, there's an "uber-plot" behind it all that may one day be resolved and bring the series to a close, assuming BioWare continue to refer to his original (and closely guarded) narrative documents.
 
Read more
articles.title: The trick to Dragon Age's lore is that the lore is lying, says original "uber-plot" writer David Gaider

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Inflexion Games are closing their UK office, laying off staff and restructuring their main Canadian studio after failing to find commercial success with their Victorian fantasy survival game Nightingale. Reportedly, at least 22 people have been let go.
 Read more
articles.title: Nightingale can't outfly "the stark realities of the industry" as creators Inflexion close UK office and lay people off

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Zavedení emulace NUMA zvyšuje výkon u Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 průměrně až o 46 % ve vícevláknových úlohách. Použití emulace NUMA dokáže patrně lépe využít paměťový řadič v SoC Broadcom nebo paměť samotnou. Povíme si, jak emulaci NUMA vyzkoušet a otestovat.
articles.title: NUMA pro Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 přináší vyšší výkon ve více vláknech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V článcích o scikit-learn jsme se zabývali zpracováním a predikcí numerických dat. Ovšem v praxi je zapotřebí pracovat i s dokumenty psanými v přirozeném jazyce. I v takových případech najde scikit-learn své využití.
articles.title: Využití knihovny scikit-learn pro zpracování a analýzu přirozeného jazyka (NLP)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Vondráček)
articles.description: Na Univerzitě Pardubice jsme se rozhodli nasadit IPv6 only síť na eduroamu. Získané zkušenosti nyní sdílím, protože mi při práci chyběl komplexní návod, který by spojil jednotlivé služby do jednoho řešení.
articles.title: Univerzitní eduroam pouze na IPv6: CLAT, DHCPv6 a logování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se společně podíváme na vizuální editor webových aplikací, vytrénujeme si jazykový model a nakonec si necháme vytvořit odhad spotřeby energie.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (13. 11. 2024): upravujte web přímo za provozu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V neděli 3. listopadu proběhl druhý den letošní konference OpenAlt. Mluvilo se o regulaci technologií, moderním linuxovém instalátoru, retro notebooku, mobilním systému Sailfish a snu o létajícím kole.
articles.title: Létající rotoped, regulace technologií a retro notebook, neděle na OpenAltu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes si ukážeme další možnosti čipu OPL3, zejména použití nových podporovaných tvarů vln (waveform) a taktéž režim propojení čtyř operátorů, které vytvoří jediný kanál.
articles.title: Programování zvukových karet s čipem OPL 3: modifikace tvaru vlny a zvukové kanály se čtyřmi operátory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ČD - Telematika)
articles.description: V dnešním díle pravidelných pondělních postřehů z oblasti kybernetické bezpečnosti se podíváme na boj s DDoS útoky, mezinárodní operace Interpolu, opravu kritických chyb v Androidu a malware CRON#TRAP.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: pád tržiště pro DDoS útoky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Vývojový tým stojící za prostředím LXQt napsaným v Qt oznámil vydání LXQt 2.1 s experimentální podporou Waylandu. Na FreeCADu postavený komerční CAD Ondsel po dvou letech ukončil svou činnost.
articles.title: LXQt 2.1 s podporou Waylandu, komerční CAD Ondsel skončil

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ryzen 7 9800X3D je hit, balení pro Evropu mají překupníci, týden v KDE se spoustou opravených chyb, vývojová verze Wine 9.21, vývoj Mesa 24.3 se chýlí ke konci, vytvořena větev 25.0.
articles.title: Blender má nové malířské možnosti, AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D nedostatkový

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Detectron2 je framework vyvíjený a udržovaný firmou Facebook, který slouží k detekci objektů a segmentaci obrázků, zahrnující implementaci mnoha modelů, např. RetinaNet, Mask R-CNN, Faster R-CNN a dalších.
articles.title: Detectron2: najdi mi na fotce medvěda

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Linuxové jádro verze 6.13 je teprve na cestě. V rámci ní chystá AMD přepnutí svých procesorů z architektonicky staršího řízení provozních parametrů pomocí ACPI CPUfreq na vlastní ovladač AMD P-State. Prvotní měření Phoronixu ukazují, že výsledkem bude úspornější chod, resp. vyšší výkon.
articles.title: Test AMD P-State na EPYC 9005 na jádru 6.13 ukazuje, že AMD se dobře připravila

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: O půlnoci z pondělí na úterý příští týden bude zahájen prodej kusově omezené bílo-šedé varianty přenosné konzole Steam Deck OLED za cenu 679 dolarů. Zařízení mohou zakoupit Steam uživatelé s nějakým předchozím nákupem na Steamu před listopadem 2024 a kteří současně nemají ban.
articles.title: Limitovaná edice Steam Deck OLED v bílém provedení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Od 1. března příštího roku zvýší sdružení CZ.NIC velkoobchodní cenu domény .CZ na 160 korun (bez DPH) za jeden kalendářní rok. Dosud byla velkoobchodní cena české národní domény 145 korun (bez DPH), jedná se tedy o zvýšení o 15 korun.
articles.title: CZ.NIC zvýší velkoobchodní cenu domény na 160 korun bez DPH

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Společnost initMAX pořádá webinář zdarma, tentokrát na populární téma bezpečnosti - Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault. Rezervujte si datum 14. listopadu 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00. Zabezpečení Zabbixu - pokryjeme ochranu komunikace frontendu, serveru, proxy, databáze a napojení na externí klíčenky (HashiCorp, CyberArk, OpenBAO), včetně praktické ukázky propojení.
articles.title: Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault - webinář zdarma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ve dvou nově vydaných Intel Security Advisory (INTEL-SA-01079, INTEL-SA-01101 informuje americký výrobce o opravě tří zranitelností svých procesorů Xeon.
articles.title: Intel opravuje tři zranitelnosti CPU Xeon s SGX, vydal aktualizaci mikrokódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linux je v síťovém prostředí jako doma, může zastat prakticky všechny potřebné role od směrovače (router), přes DHCP, DNS až po souborový server Samba pro Microsoft Windows. Přijďte se to všechno naučit na naše třídenní školení s názvem Linux: správa počítačové sítě.
articles.title: Linux a správa počítačové sítě (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost VMware oznámila, že její desktopové hypervizory VMware Fusion a VMware Workstation jsou nyní zdarma pro osobní, vzdělávací i komerční použití. S okamžitou platností přechází VMware Fusion i VMware Workstation z modelu placeného předplatného, což znamená, že tyto nástroje můžete nyní využívat bez jakýchkoli nákladů. Placené verze těchto nabídek – Workstation Pro a Fusion Pro – již nebude možné zakoupit, uvedl Himanshu Singh, ředitel produktového marketingu společnosti Broadcom.
articles.title: VMware nabízí Workstation a Fusion zdarma pro všechny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Ve čtvrtek 14. listopadu se uskuteční OWASP Czech chapter meeting, který opět zavítá do Brna. Registrovaným jako vždy nabídne přísun zajímavostí z oblasti IT bezpečnosti a to ve formě dvou večerních přednášek, na které je registrace zcela zdarma. Detaily programu a možnost se registrovat naleznete na Eventbrite.
articles.title: Pozvánka na OWASP Czech chapter meeting 14. listopadu v Brně

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Do kompozitoru Mutter z projektu GNOME míří úprava, který zlepší jeho interní logiku rozhodování, které GPU v systému s více přítomnými je primárním. Nejde o změnu revoluční, cílí primárně na notebooky a hlavním mechanismem je preference GPU, které je připojeno na eDP výstup, tedy k internímu displeji notebooku.
articles.title: GNOME Mutter se podle eDP lépe rozhodne, které GPU je primární

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: P-State ovladač Intelu bude využívat Energy Aware Scheduling (EAS) pro mobilní generaci Lunar Lake, aktuální notebookovou generaci CPU Intel. Jde o plánovač úloh pro jejich rozdělování mezi úsporná E-jádra a výkonná P-jádra s novým přístupem, napojený na řízení frekvencí jader skrze ovladač Intel P-State ( intel_pstate).
articles.title: Energy Aware Scheduling zefektivní chod CPU Intel Lunar Lake

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Správce české národní domény posílil kapacitu první linky do národního propojovacího internetového centra NIX.CZ na 400 Gbit, čímž si zajistil nejvyšší dostupnou propustnost do páteře českého internetu po jedné lince.
articles.title: CZ.NIC navýšil kapacitu připojení do NIX.CZ na 510 Gbit/s

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: @verosk)
articles.description: Dnes okolo 15:00 vyšla oprava kritické chyby v monitorovacím nástroji Icinga. Ovlivňuje Icinga 2 Masters, Satellites i Agents v různých nastaveních. Autoři doporučují aktualizovat co nejdřív.
articles.title: Kritická oprava v monitorovacím nástroji Icinga

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Do blížícího se vydání kompilátorů GCC 15 míří nové optimalizace pro lepší běh na posledních dvou DDR5 generacích procesorů AMD, tedy Zen 4 a Zen 5 (tj. Ryzeny 7000 a 9000 a jim odpovídající Threadrippery a EPYCy). Specificky jde o optimalizaci X86_TUNE_AVX512_TWO_EPILOGUES v rámci patche, který do projektu zaslal Richard Biener ze SUSE.
articles.title: GCC 15 dostane AVX-512 optimalizace pro AMD Zen 4 a Zen 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: GitHub Spark je technológia na tvorbu aplikácií pomocou AI asistenta a plne manažovaného prostredia. Umožní vytvárať a zdieľať tzv. mikroaplikácie (sparks) pomocou prirodzeného jazyka. Bežní užívatelia budú tak môct vytvárať kompletné aplikácie bez potreby programovať alebo nasadzovať kód.
articles.title: GitHub Spark: tvorba mikroaplikácií pre bežného smrteľníka

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Dnes vyšel oblíbený open source nástroj na testování RAM pro x86 Memtest86+ ve verzi 7.20. Nová je podpora architektury Loongson LoongArch (LA664), což je teprve druhá architektura po x86, co Memtest86+ podporuje.
articles.title: Memtest86+ 7.20 s podporou NUMA, Zen5 a Core Ultra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: PHPStan je open source statický analyzátor kódu v PHP. Dnes vyšel ve verzi 2.0. Mezi novinky opatří nová úroveň kontroly 10 (level), která je popisovaná jako „9 na steroidech“. Dále byla snížena paměťová náročnost o 50–70 %.
articles.title: PHPStan 2.0: statický analyzátor PHP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář Matteo Croce vyvinul nástroj Debcow určený pro Debian na souborových systémy s COW (copy-on-write). Na těchto souborových systémech potom dpkg při instalaci balíčků používá místo kopírování reflink, což celou instalaci podstatně zrychluje.
articles.title: Debcow pro Debian a souborové systémy s COW

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávné aktualizace Windows 11 22H2 a 23H2 v některých případech rozbíjí OpenSSH server.  Jde o říjnovou aktualizaci KB5044285 a předběžnou aktualizaci KB5044380.
articles.title: Aktualizace Windows 11 rozbíjí OpenSSH server

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: strepon)
articles.description: Německá společnost Allotropia oznámila vydání beta verze nového produktu ZetaOffice, kancelářského balíku založeného na LibreOffice.
articles.title: První vydání ZetaOffice s kancelářským balíkem ve WebAssembly

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Microsoft na blogu ve středu popsal nové AI funkce v aplikaci notepad a kreslení.  V kreslení je dostupné namalování objektu podle textového promptu a smazání objektu po jeho přibližném označení. Mazání bude dostupné všem, kreslení jen pro Copilot+ PC.
articles.title: Notepad a kreslení ve Windows 11 dostanou funkce AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jádro Linuxu umožňuje preemptivní multitasking již od verze 2.5.4. Na výběr jsou v současnosti tři možnosti: PREEMPT_NONE pro servery, PREEMP_VOLUNTARY pro desktop a PREEMPT pro desktop s požadavkem na nízké latence. Vybrat je potřeba při kompilaci jádra. Navíc existuje od jádra 5.12 možnost PREEMPT_DYNAMIC, kdy je možné volbu nastavit jako parametr jádra. Bohužel na některých platformách (arm64) je to spojené se značnou dodatečnou režií, proto se nepoužívá. Nejčastěji v distribucích vidíme PREEMPT_VOLUNTARY a třeba Ubuntu navíc nabízí jádra s označením -lowlatency, které právě mají zapnutý plný PREEMPT.
articles.title: Jádro 6.13 bude mít PREEMPT_LAZY

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Před pár dny vyšel GIMP 3.0 RC1.  Autoři k tomu napsali obsáhlý příspěvek na blogu. V něm mimo jiné píší, že po vydání verze 3.0 se budou soustředit na menší vydání s novými funkcemi. A že chtějí vydat GIMP 3.2 do roka od vydání 3.0 a ne v roce 2050, což je častým žertem.
articles.title: Gimp 3.2 můžeme prý očekávat do roka od vydání 3.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: CEO OpenAI Sam Altman ve středu oznámil novou doménu chat.com pro ChatGPT. Zajímavé je, jak se k lukrativní doméně dostal. Dharmesh Shah koupil doménu na začátku roku 2023 za 15,5 miliónů dolarů. Tu poté prodal za neupřesněnou částku právě OpenAI.
articles.title: ChatGPT má novou doménu chat.com

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář Intelu Dave Hansen poslal včera do LKML návrh, aby jádro hlásilo zastaralý mikrokód procesoru jako zranitelnost. Dave říká, že v současnosti prakticky není možné provozovat starý mikrokód a zároveň pokládat počítač za bezpečný. Zranitelnost navrhuje zobrazit pomocí „Vulnerable“ pohromadě s ostatními zranitelnostmi v souboru:
articles.title: Intel má úpravu jádra, které bude hlásit starý mikrokód jako zranitelnost

Global Mobile Broadband Forum 2024: 5.5G a AI jako základ nové éry mobilní komunikace. Digitální podnikové služby v Česku nabírají na síle: 175 tisíc zaměstnanců, robotizace a nové investice táhnou růst. Dell Technologies rozšiřuje portfolio Dell AI Factory o nové servery PowerEdge. Agentforce od Salesforce: důvěryhodní, autonomní agenti s umělou inteligencí posilují pracovní síly ve firmách.

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Apple last week released their latest iMac, Mac Mini, and MacBook Pro products powered by their fourth-generation M-series Apple Silicon. The new Mac Mini in particular is interesting for under $600 starting out with the all re-designed Mac Mini with 10-core M4 and now the base model having 16GB of memory. It will take some time before there is any reasonable Linux support on the M4 hardware with Asahi Linux, but for those curious about how the M4 Mac Mini with macOS compares to AMD Ryzen and Intel Core CPUs under Linux, here are some preliminary benchmarks.
articles.title: Apple M4 Mac Mini With macOS vs. Intel / AMD With Ubuntu Linux Performance

This RISC-V motherboard is being developed in cooperation with DeepComputing. Early access pricing and more details on this quad-core StarFive JH7110 powered mainboard for the Framework 13 have now been announced...
articles.title: RISC-V Motherboard For Framework 13 Pricing Starts At $368 In Early Access, $928 For Laptop

Since Linux 6.11 getrandom in the vDSO has expanded to more CPU architectures and now there's a notable user-space user ready to go: the GNU C Library "glibc" support was merged...

This "RWF_UNCACHED" work was originally started back in 2019 while a renewed effort around it is showing ~65% faster read/write performance and so far has been extended to work across EXT4, Btrfs, and XFS file-systems...

articles.description: The "intel_idle" driver provides CPU idle time management for Intel processors on Linux for helping to put the processor into low-power states in conjunction with the MWAIT instruction. With the upcoming Linux 6.13 kernel, the Granite Rapids D support for the Intel Idle driver is set to be merged...

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: One of the many changes to look forward to with the upcoming Linux 6.13 kernel cycle is the AMD P-State driver to be used by default with the new EPYC 9005 series processors. While AMD Ryzen CPUs for a while now have been defaulting to the modern AMD P-State driver that makes use of ACPI CPPC platform support for allowing better power efficiency, AMD EPYC CPUs have kept to using the generic ACPI CPUFreq frequency scaling driver. But now AMD engineers have deemed amd_pstate ready for use with EPYC 9005 "Turin" CPUs and will be the default choice moving forward. Here is more information and power/performance benchmarks for this shift while testing using the EPYC 9755 processors.
articles.title: Early Benchmarks: AMD EPYC 9005 Performance & Power Efficiency To Lead Further With Linux 6.13

articles.description:
The third Sonic the Hedgehog movie may not be the last. In a recent interview, director Jeff Fowler hinted that the upcoming Sonic the Hedgehog 3 will include another character tease, setting things up for a potential fourth film.


Fowler revealed the news while speaking with Entertainment Weekly. While discussing what's next for the film franchise, Fowler said the third movie will have a post-credit scene featuring a new character. While he doesn't outright confirm a Sonic the Hedgehog 4, Sonic 3 will offer some kind of hint as to where the series can go. 


"It's fun to see the fan debates online about who's coming up next, who's going to be teased at the end of the film," Fowler told Entertainment Weekly. "We have a lot of the same conversations. We've all got our favorites on the film…
articles.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 movie will tease a possible fourth film with a new character, director reveals

The Glitchwalkers DLC is now live in Astroneer, and a lot has changed as part of the new content. But to enjoy all of that, you'll need to be able to access the expansion first.


The Glitchwalkers DLC is the first major expansion that has been released by developers System Era Softworks, and there are plenty of great reasons to be excited about it. But first things first, you'll want to play a part of the core game to gain access to the new planet Aeoluz. Whether you're a beginner or a returning veteran of the game, this guide will help you gain access to the new gameplay content.


How to access the Glitchwalkers DLC in Astroneer


For starters, you'll have to buy the Glitchwalkers DLC, and this part is pretty obvious. You can do this by either getting the Glitchwalkers Edition or purcha…

articles.author: Julián F.L.
articles.description:
Microsoft and Xbox have been weirdly missing from the world of handheld gaming: Nintendo basically pioneered the market with the Game Boy line, and later revolutionized it with the DS and 3DS, while Sony found varying levels of success with the PlayStation Portable and its successor, the Vita.


Screenshot via Xbox/YouTube


Phil Spencer, the current CEO of Microsoft Gaming, is well aware of Xbox's absence from the handheld gaming market, and he just revealed something quite fascinating about it. In an interview with Bloomberg, Spencer not only confirmed that Microsoft has plans of making a handheld device, but that the company is already working on prototypes and considering what exactly to make. However, he also confirmed that this device is still a few years away from becoming a reality…
articles.title: Phil Spencer confirms that Microsoft is working on an Xbox handheld

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
It’s been a while since we last visited the Pandæmonium raid storyline in Final Fantasy XIV, but with the release of patch 7.1, the epilogue for the story is finally available to play. What’s more, it comes with some worthwhile rewards, so it’s definitely worth seeking out. 


If you think back to the Pandæmonium raids, specifically the 11th Circle, you’ll remember Themis, which is the true name of Elidibus. Don’t worry if you’re confused even now by the Convocation of the Fourteen, it’s enough to confuse even the biggest lorehound. You’ll also likely remember that when we last visited the Pandæmonium storyline, Themis acknowledged us as a friend before returning to the Aetherial Sea. 


Now it’s time to wrap up the story completely, and you’ll get your own mini Themis for doing so. To get…
articles.title: How to get the Wind-up Themis minion in Final Fantasy XIV

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Twitch drops are a favorite among community members for pretty much every game, mostly because they're free! Overwatch 2 isn’t an exception, as Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops is released. This article will provide you with everything you need to know about the Season 13 Twitch Drops of Overwatch 2. 


Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops rewards




There are four rewards that you snag in Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops. Here are the rewards:



Ringleader Spray


Ringleader Player Icon


Ringleader Name Card


Ringleader Reaper Epic Skin



How to get the Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops


Before we dive in, you have to connect your Battle.net ID with your Twitch account. To do that, follow these steps:



Step 1: Open the official Battle.net website and login with your account that is linked with the game.


Step 2: Once logged in, go to the connections page and select Twitch to connect your account.


Step 3: Now sign in with your Twitch account and link with your Battle.net ID.



Once linked, now head to the Overwatch 2 directory and watch any streams that have mentioned drops in their title. Here is the list of all required watch time for snagging Twitch Drops:



Ringleader Spray: You have to watch the stream for a total of seven hours.


Ringleader Player Icon: You have to watch the stream for a total of four hours.


Ringleader Name Card: You have to watch the stream for a total of 11 hours.


Ringleader Reaper Epic Skin: You have to watch the stream for a total of 15 hours.



Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops available regions


Here is the list of available regions that can snag the Twitch Drops:



North America


Latin America


Europe


Middle East


Africa


South Korea


Japan


Taiwan


Southeast Asia


Australia


New Zealand



What is the end date of Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops?


The Twitch Drops have already been released and will wrap up on November 22, 2024.

The post Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops: All rewards and how to unlock appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Overwatch 2 Mid-Season 13 Twitch Drops: All rewards and how to unlock

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
Did you know you can purchase the entire Metro trilogy of games for less than $7 on Steam? Well, today is the last day you can do it. There are less than 24 hours to save about 90% on three of the best niche post-apocalyptic games to grace the last 14 years.


The entire Metro saga is on sale to celebrate the release of Metro Awakening, which launched for VR devices on November 7. But if you're not really a VR player and still fancy a tour through an apocalyptic wasteland, now's a good time to consider grabbing the games that came before it — if you don't already own them. Personally, playing VR games makes me feel a bit queasy after a while. I'm fine fighting mutant bats as my air supply slowly dwindles, but I'm happier doing it without the added nausea. 


Image via 4A Games


Metro Saga…
articles.title: Today is the last day you can purchase the Metro game saga at 90% off on Steam

One game has you interred in an asylum, while the other has you fixing the relationships of the gods. However, what they have in common is head nods and fixing people.

articles.description:
With the release of patch 7.1 in Final Fantasy XIV, many new items were added that can be purchased or obtained from various sources. One of these items was foretold in the preliminary patch notes and can turn even the clumsiest of players into a cocktail genius. 


The Shake Drink emote is a perpetual emote, meaning that it doesn’t end until you move or do something to interrupt it. It’s not just visual, either, as long as the emote is being performed, a shaking sound will accompany the movement. 


This is a particularly exciting emote for those who dip into the FFXIV Roleplay community, particularly those who partake in the nightlife scene. It adds a new level of realism to the bars and clubs frequented by players and it is a welcome surprise for this patch. 


How to get the Shake Drin…
articles.title: How to get the Shake Drink emote in Final Fantasy XIV

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
While most of the Warcraft Direct was...well...direct, Blizzard did end the show with a bit of a teaser: Player Housing is finally coming to World of Warcraft. The brief 44-second teaser showed a character walking into his home, with the walls adorned with the head of Onyxia, a Mechanical Shredder statue, and other various items from the popular MMORPG before taking a drink from a mug with the words "Home sweet Home" on it. The teaser ends by showing the World of Warcraft: Midnight logo, hinting that the feature will be part of the upcoming Midnight expansion.




It's a feature that players have wanted since the start of the MMORPG's life back in 2004. Without many details, it's hard to know what exactly we're going to be getting with this, but as long as it's heavily customizable, we can show off some of our best achievements with it, and we can invite our friends, I think that would be a good start. Just no Garrison 2.0, please.



The post World of Warcraft teases much requested feature: Player Housing appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: World of Warcraft teases much requested feature: Player Housing

The recent patch 7.1 brought a few new graphical updates to Final Fantasy XIV, and developer Naoki Yoshida acknowledged during Live Letter 84 that it might change how player characters looked, even if only slightly. 


To combat this, the developers dropped in a new quest that can be undertaken for players to get their hands on yet another free Phial of Fantasia. Unlike the previous quest, which was added during the 7.0 update when Dawntrail was released, this second quest is only available for a limited time and will cease to exist once patch 7.2 is released. 


If you’ve been wandering around Eorzea for hours on end looking for this second free Fantasia, which is definitely worth it considering the usual cost of $10 per Phial, then you might be surprised to know where it actually comes f…

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
It seems as though there are three certainties in life: death, taxes, and there must be a World of Warcraft Classic server running. During today's Warcraft Direct, Blizzard announced that World of Warcraft will once again be returning to its Vanilla roots with the launch of World of Warcraft Classic 20th Anniversary Edition. Those interested in once again reliving the glory days can look forward to doing so when the servers launch globally next week on November 21.




Despite how much I enjoy the retail version of World of Warcraft, there's just something about WoW Classic. I'm sure a lot of it is the nostalgia; the reverberating memories of a simpler time is admittedly part of the appeal to me. But even from a gameplay standpoint, despite the many similarities between the old and new ver…
articles.title: World of Warcraft getting the Classic treatment again with 20th Anniversary Realms

During a recent investor call, the developer of Stellar Blade confirmed that it's aiming to port the game to PC in 2025. More specifically, it plans to deliver the game to Steam following the explosive success of Black Myth: Wukong on PC.


The plan was revealed after Shift Up, the South Korean developer behind Stellar Blade, answered a question about a potential PC port. Not only does the team expect to release the game on PC next year, but it believes Stellar Blade will excel by being on storefronts such as Steam. Shift Up acknowledged Wukong, which was released on PlayStation 5 and PC to, well, stellar results. The game peaked at 2.4 million players on Steam, eclipsing long-time titans such as Counter-Strike 2, Dota 2, and (uh) Banana.


"Considering recent trends such as Steam's increa…
articles.title: Stellar Blade developer is planning for a PC port in 2025

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Ever since 2v2 was introduced in Clash Royale, players have constantly been in demand for the 2v2 ranked mode. Now, after a long wait, the developers have introduced a dedicated v2 league in the game, but issues led to its temporary deactivation. 


This article will tell you everything you need to know about why the 2v2 League in Clash Royale was temporarily deactivated.


All possible reasons for 2v2 League temporarily deactivation in Clash Royale


Game crash


The biggest reason for the deactivation of the 2v2 League for a short period of time is due to the game crashes that are occurring when you invite your friends to play together. The fact that players can’t invite their friends for 2v2 matches has caused a lot of frustration in the community. People are really upset about it and are hoping the developers will fix the issue soon.


Zero gold


When you win a match in the 2v2 League, you don’t earn any gold, which is one of the main reasons the developers decided to temporarily disable the mode.


But here’s something you need to know: it is just a visual error, and you receive the desired amount of gold you get by winning the match. It is expected that the developer will provide the fix very soon.


No season tokens


Basically, when you win three matches in 2v2 League, you are supposed to get 800 season tokens, which is unfortunately replaced by Wooden Chests in the chest cycle. So, if you have claimed the Wooden Chests already, it is expected that the developers will provide you with a way to get the season tokens. 

The post Clash Royale 2v2 League temporarily deactivated: All possible reasons appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Clash Royale 2v2 League temporarily deactivated: All possible reasons

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
I'm pretty sure everyone had this on their Bingo Card for Warcraft Direct, but in case you didn't: surprise! As World of Warcraft: Cataclysm Classic nears its end, Blizzard has officially announced the Classic servers will continue progressing forward onto World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic. No exact release date was given, but the switch from Cataclysm Classic to Mists of Pandaria Classic will happen in 2025.




Although this natural progression into Mists of Pandaria Classic was expected, I still can't help to be excited. I didn't play much of Cataclysm Classic because if I'm being quite honest, I'm not too fond of the expansion. Mists of Pandaria however is responsible to some of my favorite memories in World of Warcraft outside of Vanilla and maybe Wrath of the Lich King.


The expansion ups the level cap to 90 and adds the new Pandaren race and Monk class. The Pandaren are rather unique as the player can choose to join either the Horde or the Alliance at the end of the starter zone questline for the race. Mists of Pandariaalso added Challenge Modes for dungeons as well as the Pet Battle system.


World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic will begin in 2025.



The post Surprise, surprise, World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic coming after Cataclysm Classic appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Surprise, surprise, World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic coming after Cataclysm Classic

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Centurions: TOTW Play objective is now live in EA FC 25, and it's a great way to get some amazing packs to improve your Ultimate Team squad.


The latest objective is pretty simple in terms of the tasks and their conditions. You can complete them easily by playing the game and get fodder packs in return. The key is to get the group rewards, as it's the most valuable pack among all the available ones. Let's take a look at how you can easily complete the challenge. 


EA FC 25 Centurions: TOTW Play objective guide


The latest objective set has five different tasks. 


Task
How to complete





TOTW Takedown
Defeat the featured Team of the Week Squad Battles squad.
78+ x2 Rare Gold Players Pack


TOTW Goal Streak
Score 20 goals using TOTW players in any Ultimate Team game mode.
78+ x3 Rare Gold Players Pack


Assist of the Week
Assist 20 goals using TOTW players in any Ultimate Team game mode.
78+ x5 Rare Gold Players Pack


TOTW Tag Team
Play 15 matches while having at least 2 TOTW players in your starting squad.
80+ x3 Rare Gold Players Pack


TOTW Victory Tour
Win 12 matches while having at least 2 TOTW players in your starting squad.
81+ x3 Rare Gold Players Pack






The biggest advantage of this objective set is the fact that you can complete it across any game mode. Hence, it's not necessary to play the Rivals game mode to complete the tasks. Instead, friendlies and Squad Battles will also count towards completion. 


Once you've completed the full set, you'll unlock a 84+ x2 Rare Gold Players pack for your efforts. It's pretty decent, and you could end up with a promo/walkout item with some luck. Hence, make sure to complete the set till it expires after two weeks from writing. 

The post All EA FC 25 Centurions: TOTW Play objective rewards and tasks appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: All EA FC 25 Centurions: TOTW Play objective rewards and tasks

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Blizzard revealed today that Warcraft 3 Reforged, the updated and remastered version of the classic RTS, is getting a big 2.0 update addressing some of the problems players have had with the Reforged version since launch. Alongside further visual updates to textures, lighting, and effects, Warcraft 3 Reforged 2.0 also comes with a much-needed revamped ranked ladder system and in-game hot key customization. Warcraft 3 Reforged 2.0 is live now and available to those who already purchased Reforged.




The highly anticipated Warcraft 3 Reforged launched back in January 2020 but immediately had a rocky start with washed unit graphics that blended in with the background, major performance issues including frequent crashes, barely any actual upgrades or changes, and features that were promised in the Reforged edition missing entirely. Blizzard began issue refunds to those who requested one, and Warcraft 3 Reforged went pretty silent.


The upgrades with 2.0 are definitely a step in the right direction, and a deserved one. Warcraft 3 is still one of the best RTS of all time, so seeing it get some extra love and care is a good thing.


The Warcraft Battlechest includes Warcraft 1: Remastered, Warcraft 2: Remastered, Warcraft 3: Reforged 2.0, and the original versions of Warcraft: Orcs and Humans and Warcraft 2: Tides of Darkness. It also includes some cosmetic DLC across many Blizzard games including Warcraft 3: Reforged multiplayer hero skins and a World of Warcraft Meat Wagon mount. It will run you $39.99 and is out now on Battle.net.

The post Warcraft 3 Reforged gets another chance with 2.0 update which is live now appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warcraft 3 Reforged gets another chance with 2.0 update which is live now

Mounts are always a worthwhile investment in Final Fantasy XIV, whether you need to grind for an achievement or hoard up some currency to purchase them. One of the new mounts added in patch 7.1 is perfectly prehistoric and weirdly adorable. 


The Brachiosaurus is a dinosaur that roamed the Earth during the late Jurassic period, roughly 150 million years ago. I’m not entirely sure what that means for the time-setting of FFXIV, and I don’t really want to think about it too much, but either way, it’s not every day that you get to have your very own dinosaur to mount up on while you go exploring. 


How to get the Brachiosaur mount in Final Fantasy XIV

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
As part of Blizzard's Warcraft Direct celebrating 30 years of Warcraft, the developer has announced remastered versions of the original Warcraft RTS, Warcraft: Orcs and Humans as well as the sequel Warcraft 2: Tides of Darkness. The remastered version of both games allows you to switch between the classic graphics and a remastered look with improved visuals. Both games are available now on Battle.net and also in a returned Warcraft Battlechest that includes both games and Warcraft 3 Reforged.




Other improvements to the RTS includes a new setting to enable click to move, faster overall game speeds, and new UI and UX improvements to both games. The UI improvements include updated tooltips, HP bars, a new mission select screen, and increased unit selection sizes when dragging over your armies of units.


The Warcraft Battlechest includes Warcraft 1: Remastered, Warcraft 2: Remastered, Warcraft 3: Reforged 2.0, and the original versions of Warcraft: Orcs and Humans and Warcraft 2: Tides of Darkness. It also includes some cosmetic DLC across many Blizzard games including Warcraft 3: Reforged multiplayer hero skins and a World of Warcraft Meat Wagon mount. It will run you $39.99 and is out now on Battle.net.

The post Warcraft: Orcs and Humans and Warcraft 2 receive HD remasters, out now appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warcraft: Orcs and Humans and Warcraft 2 receive HD remasters, out now

The Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC is now live in EA FC 25, and it's a unique challenge in every way. 


For starters, you'll get a total of 100 different items by completing the challenge, but there's no guarantee of a promo item or a walkout. You'll have to submit three squads to complete the SBC, so it requires a fair amount of fodder. Let's look at how you can complete the challenge to unlock the rewards. 


EA FC 25 Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC tasks


The Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC has three different tasks, and here are their conditions. 


Task 1 - 82-rated squad



Min. Team Rating: 82



Task 2 - 82-rated squad



Min. 1 Players: Team of the Week


Min. Team Rating: 82



Task 3 - 83-rated squad



Min. 1 Players: Team of the Week


Min. Team Rating: 83



EA FC 25 Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC solutions


Here's a set of solutions you can use to complete the SBC for cheap. 


Task 1 - 82-rated squad



Any 10 82-rated items


Any 1 81-rated item



Task 2 - 82-rated squad



Any 10 82-rated items


Any 1 81-rated TOTW



Task 3 - 83-rated squad



Any 10 83-rated items


Any 1 82-rated TOTW



After completing the challenge, you'll get a 100 Mixed Players Pack. This is a unique pack, and it contains a total of 100 player items. The player items will be divided into 20 Rare Gold, 25 Common Gold, 30 Silver, and 25 Bronze. One of the cards is guaranteed to be rated 84 or higher. 


While the SBC suddenly looks interesting, only try it if you have enough disposable TOTW items. They are extremely important, and they're required in almost every good SBC. Hence, it might have some merit to hold on to them for the future SBCs to come in Ultimate Team. 

The post EA FC 25: How to complete Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC appeared first on Destructoid.

Even though it's got its quirks, Project Zomboid largely follows the real world's rules of survival, and though we don't have zombies running around (yet), we do know that leather protects from bites. Even if you're a total newcomer to Project Zomboid, the odds are good that you'll quickly find out just how useful it is to rip clothes apart. Customizing everything about your Sims is one of the major draws of The Sims 4. From their hair color, eye color, skin color, clothing, accessories, and more, every minute detail about your Sims is up for you to decide.


There is one outfit, however, that doesn’t appear in Create-a-Sim for you to alter, and that’s your Sim’s work clothes. This can be an issue if your Sim shows up to their high-profile lawyer career in swim trunks. Luckily, we’re here to show you how to modify your sim’s career outfit. 


How to change a Sim’s work outfit in The Sims 4


In order to change your Sim’s work clothes, you’ll need to use the cheat ‘Sims.Modify_Career_Outfit_in_CAS’ in the cheat console. By entering this cheat, you’ll be taken into Create-a-Sim mode, and be free to choose their clothing when the…

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
The three goblin leaders in Baldur's Gate 3 are tough to handle, especially Dror Ragzlin. He deals a ton of damage to anyone he hits. However, with the right preparations, you can make it through. Here's how to take out Dror Ragzlin in Baldur's Gate 3. 



How to take out the Baldur's Gate 3 Dror Ragzlin boss


The easiest way to defeat Dror Ragzlin in BG3 is to push all his goblin soldiers down the pit while your tankiest characters deal with him. Make sure you always have someone ready to heal whoever is taking blows from his Faithbreaker Warhammer. Keep his goblin allies away from him to prevent his Aura of Leadership from boosting their damage. 


However, you must not push him down the pit if you want Dror Ragzlin's magic Warhammer, the Faithbreaker, or his Mind Flayer Parasite. Doing…
articles.title: Baldur’s Gate 3: How to take out Dror Ragzlin

articles.author: Annie Thelen
articles.description:
One of the most difficult locations you’ll need to get to in Baldur’s Gate 3 is the enigmatic Temple of Bhaal. This dark temple is part of one of the main quests in Act III, where players will need to find a way into it to eventually rescue their companion from Orin the Red. 


Just getting there, however, is no easy task. In order to get in, you’ll need to follow the right steps. We’re here to show you how to enter the Temple of Bhaal. Be aware that there are spoilers ahead. 


How to get into the Temple of Bhaal in Baldur’s Gate 3


The most important part of getting into the Temple of Bhaal is obtaining the Amulet of Bhaal, which unlocks the door at the Manslaughter’s Chasm. This leads you into the Temple of Bhaal itself.


The Amulet of Bhaal won’t be easy to get. To do so, you’ll need…
articles.title: How to enter the Temple of Bhaal door in Baldur’s Gate 3

articles.author: Franklin Bellone Borges
articles.description:
The second Co-Op Dungeon you will unlock in Throne and Liberty, Roaring Temple (also known as Temple of Roar) will put you up against two sub-bosses and the party-killing machine known as King Chimaerus. 


But believe it or not, although a completely different beast compared to Specter’s Abyss, clearing the dungeon can be a fairly simple affair. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to complete the Roaring Temple Co-Op Dungeon in Throne and Liberty.


How to Complete the Roaring Temple Dungeon in Throne and Liberty


After diving into the Roaring Temple on any given role, you will need to first defeat two Ancient Zombie Mutts, one Ancient Shade Monk, and one Ancient Dark Shaman to break through its first barrier. Among the enemies, the Dark Shamam will pose the biggest threat, as they can ch…
articles.title: Throne and Liberty: Roaring Temple Full Dungeon Guide

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
There's a lot to discover on the expansive grounds of Botany Manor, and you'll soon be able to do so on Sony's platforms. Publisher Whitethorn Games announced plans to bring Balloon Studios' puzzler to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on December 17, 2024. 


There's nothing unique to the consoles to keep an eye out for with this release, but at the very least it offers another way to explore this quaint and thoughtful little gem. Check out a brief look at the PS4 and PS5 versions in the announcement video below.




Botany Manor first opened its gates on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) on April 9. It's also available via Game Pass for any subscribers who want to give it a quick go as part of their membership. 


For those who haven't done so yet, Botany Manor follows retired botanist Arabella Greene. Thanks to her storied career, she now has a large collection of rare, and in some cases forgotten, plants. It's up to you to explore the manor, dig through Arabella's notes, and find out the right way to ensure their growth and continued survival. 


Botany Manor isn't just about bringing a bunch of plants back to life. Well, that's a large part of it, but it also hinges on learning more about Arabella's experiences as a woman scientist in the 19th century. You'll be able to piece together her life and what she went through, all while gathering the clues necessary to help the manor's many plants thrive. If you love plants but have the polar opposite of a green thumb, this is your ideal escape.

The post Botany Manor makes PS4, PS5 debut on December 17 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Botany Manor makes PS4, PS5 debut on December 17

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The alleged owner and operator of FMovies and affiliated platforms, together considered the most visited pirate sites on the planet before they were recently shut down, has confessed and will be prosecuted in Vietnam. Phan Thành Công, 34, is said to have operated the site between 2016 and 2024. An accomplice, Nguyen Tuan Anh, also 34, allegedly uploaded 50,000 videos.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: FMovies Piracy ‘Mastermind’ Confesses, Authorities Confirm Piracy Prosecution

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
BREIN has obtained a new blocking order in the Netherlands targeting TorrentGalaxy, one the world's most popular torrent sites.  Internet provider Odido objected to the request, arguing that the Dutch anti-piracy group could have done more to target the problem closer to the source. The Rotterdam District Court found that the anti-piracy group can't be expected to do more than it's already done.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Dutch Court Orders ISP to Block Torrent Site TorrentGalaxy

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Google is facing criticism in Spain and Italy for alleged anti-piracy failures. The latest claim accuses Google of ignoring notices that aim to remove pirate IPTV providers from search results. So here's the thing: why would a company take down 10 billion URLs from search but suddenly start acting differently? The public labeling of Google as "grossly negligent" deserves context too; two weeks ago, Google's diligence prevented one of its accusers from deindexing its own website.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google’s “Negligent” Piracy Response Prevented Critic Deindexing Its Own Site

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Korean authorities have shut down the popular video piracy service TVWIKI, which had millions of users.  A special unit of the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism arrested the alleged operator, who is also believed to be connected to other streaming platforms. These include OKTOON, which was also pulled offline, and piracy giant NoonooTV, which voluntarily threw in the towel last year. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Kingpin Behind ‘Noonoo TV’ and ‘TVWiki’ Arrested in Korea

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Several major record labels are asking the Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals for a rehearing en banc in their piracy lawsuit against Grande Communications. They argue that the court erred in holding that piracy damages should be calculated per album, rather than per song. They argue that this decision, which will lower the $47 million damages award, doesn't reflect the way that music is commercialized today.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Per-Song or Per-Album? Record Labels Challenge Court’s Piracy Damages Ruling

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Deadpool & Wolverine' tops the chart, followed by 'Joker: Folie à Deux'. 'The Substance' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 11/11/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After DAZN received a warning for the blunder that saw Google Drive blocked in Italy, a company behind a smart TV video player app had a DAZN-initiated blocking decision revoked after a successful appeal. That may seem like a win, but the finer details reveal a legal framework that favors rightsholders so strongly, online services incurring liability for the actions of users seems inevitable.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: DAZN’s Piracy Shield ‘Smart TV’ Block Revoked After IPTV Portal Complaint

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Pirate Bay TV series is the entertainment industry's depiction of the torrent site's turbulent history. The creators don't take sides but mostly focus on the legal battle that only represents part of the story. According to Pirate Bay co-founder Peter Sunde and Piratbyrån's Rasmus Fleischer, living though it all was a completely different experience.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Key Pirate Bay Figures Don’t Recognize Themselves in TV Series

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Nintendo has filed a devastating lawsuit against a gamer who not only live-streamed games before their commercial release, but used emulators and pirated ROMs to do so. Jesse Keighin, aka EveryGameGuru, faces claims of unauthorized public performance and reproduction, contributory infringement and inducement for sharing links to emulators and pirated ROMs, plus violations of the anti-circumvention and circumvention device trafficking components of the DMCA.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Nintendo Sues Emulator Gamer Who Streamed Pirated Games Before Release

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Pirate Bay made its debut as a TV series on the Swedish streaming platform SVT Play earlier today. International viewers are left waiting until other services pick it up. In the meantime, some may be tempted to explore unofficial channels for pirated copies of the show. But finding a pirated copy is proving surprisingly difficult.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirating “The Pirate Bay” TV Series is Ironically Difficult (Updated)

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A database of pirate sites maintained by City of London Police for more than a decade is set for a makeover. Earlier this year vendors were invited to bid for a contract to supply
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Police ‘Infringing Website List’ Portal Set For a £220K Makeover

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cloudflare is urging the EU Commission to exclude the company from its upcoming Piracy Watch List, despite requests from several rightsholder groups for its inclusion. The American company says it's committed to addressing piracy concerns but not at the expense of user privacy and security. Instead, the European Commission should ensure that its Piracy Watch List does not become a tool for advocating policy changes.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare to EU: Anti-Piracy Measures Shouldn’t Harm Privacy and Security

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After 15+ years of blackholing IP addresses and making the Domain Name System tell more lies than Pinocchio, some may wonder whether site-blocking is harming prospects of a future open internet. Confirmation that piracy blocking tests are now being conducted at the internet's core routers isn't a surprise. It's only the internet's spinal column, so what could possibly go wrong?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IPTV Piracy Blocking at the Internet’s Core Routers Undergoes Testing

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A lawsuit filed in the U.S. claims that a pirate IPTV seller adopted a novel marketing strategy to support a business with 450,000 subscribers . According to the plaintiffs, the owner of the service "held himself out as a Chicago-area law enforcement officer" to "mitigate potential concerns" over the unlawfulness of his business. A theoretical damages claim of more than a billion dollars, plus an allegation of wiretapping, makes this case a little more spicy than most.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV-Selling ‘Law Enforcement Officer’ Faces Wiretapping Claim

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Rightsholders have asked Google to remove more than 10 billion 'copyright infringing' URLs from its search results. The search engine doesn't celebrate the milestone in any way, but the takedown notices document intriguing shifts in volume over time, as well as shifting takedown interests. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Asked to Remove 10 Billion “Pirate” Search Results

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Pirate streaming site Braflix burst onto the scene last year, offering a vast library of movies and TV shows via a user-friendly interface. With millions of monthly visits the site was destined to profit from the demise of several large competitors. The opposite happened. Facing legal pressure, Braflix has decided to throw in the towel instead.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Braflix to Shut Down: Pirate Site Throws in the Towel Citing Legal Pressure

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Critics of Italy's Piracy Shield are not difficult to find but, with its powerful and influential proponents rarely far away, getting heard is a considerable challenge. Not to mention getting anything done. After calling for the platform's suspension and meeting resistance in the wake of the recent Google Drive blocking blunder, AGCOM board member Elisa Giomi has gone public with a laundry list of concerns. It pulls zero punches.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield Crisis Erupts as AGCOM Board Member Slams Huge Toll on Resources

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Amazon is cracking down on pirate streaming apps that offer unauthorized access to Prime Video content.  The company recently filed DMCA takedown notices with GitHub to remove APKs associated with popular apps such as PikaShow, Castle, and FlixFox.  Interestingly, the takedown requests were made on behalf of Amazon Seller Services, an Indian subsidiary not typically linked to Amazon's streaming platform.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Amazon’s Indian Branch Targets Pirate Streaming Apps Hosted on GitHub

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Prompted by concerns aired by photographers, French telecoms regulator Arcom sought to evaluate content recognition tools deployed at online content-sharing platforms. Meta's Rights Manager and Pinterest's Claim Portal were of particular interest, but both companies denied Arcom's request to measure their effectiveness. Despite the regulator's authority under law, private agreements with rightsholders took priority.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Meta Denied Regulator’s Request to Test Rights Manager’s Effectiveness

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (gu3)
articles.description:
Castle Master, the haunting conclusion to the Freescape engine saga, is now ready for public testing!
Prepare yourself for a perilous adventure as you lower the drawbridge to enter the Castle Master’s domain. Released in 1990 by Incentive Software, Castle Master became popular for its technical innovation and challenging gameplay. The game inspired countless 3D adventure titles, and the Freescape engine itself marked a technological milestone, enabling groundbreaking object interaction and spatial puzzles.
Notably, Castle Master was one of the first games to let you choose to play as either a prince or a princess, offering a different experience depending on your choice.
Your mission: rescue your twin, imprisoned within the eerie depths of Castle Eternity by the evil Magister. This sprawling, foreboding castle is filled with traps, monsters, and puzzles blocking your path. Gather items, unlock doors, and solve complex riddles as you navigate the labyrinthine halls and confront the dark forces within.
This modern reimplementation showcases enhanced graphics using OpenGL, with initial support for the DOS and ZX Spectrum releases. If you’re eager to embark on this dark journey, a playable demo is available to test your tenacity.
To participate in the testing, ensure you have a daily development build. We encourage all players to submit feedback and bug reports through our issue tracker.
Will you brave the creepy corridors of Castle Eternity and free your sibling, or will you fall victim to the Magister’s curse and join his army of enslaved spirits? The adventure awaits!
>
articles.title: Rescue your twin from the clutches of the evil Castle Master

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (sev)
articles.description:
After seven months of intense work, we are ready to announce support for a few games based on qdEngine, developed by K-D Labs.
The work is based on the original sources published now under GPL, although the work started a bit earlier than that. The engine supports 14 games, five of which we are announcing support for. Most of these games were released in Russian; however, there were Lithuanian, Czech, and Polish releases. The support is announced for:
Wait for it! Issue 3. Song for a Hare, (Russian: Ну, погоди! Выпуск 3. Песня для зайца, Lithuanian: Na, palauk! Zuikio dainos, Czech: Jen počkej a Píseň pro zajíce)
Mask Show (Russian: Маски-шоу)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat (Russian: Три маленькие белые мышки. Визит Морской крысы, Czech: Příběhy myší rodinky I, Polish: Były Sobie Myszki Trzy: Na Spotkanie Cioci Myszy)
The Adventures of the Good Soldier Schweik (Russian: Похождения бравого солдата Швейка)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday, (Russian: Три маленькие белые мышки. День рождения морской крысы, Polish: Były Sobie Myszki Trzy: Urodzinowe Śledztwo)
Other games do work; however, we haven’t playtested them. You may find more information on our Wiki. Also, we are looking for the Lithuanian version of Little Longnose and Polish releases of Little Mice games and Wait for it! game. If you happen to have a copy, please contact sev.
We continue the active development so that support for other games will follow shortly. The primary constraint is playtesting.
To run these games, you need the latest daily build of ScummVM. If you encounter any hiccups during your quests, please file them on our issue tracker.
>
articles.title: Games based on qdEngine are now supported

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (mduggan)
articles.description:
We are excited to announce that Rise of the Dragon  is now ready for public testing. This is the first of a small number of games built using the DGDS (Dynamix Game Development System) engine.
The Dynamix name may be familiar – bought by Sierra in 1990, the Dynamix brand continued and became well known for action and puzzle games like The Incredible Machine, A10 Tank Killer, and Red Baron.  They also made a few adventures using the custom DGDS engine.
Rise of the Dragon is set in Los Angeles in a dark version of the future, circa 2053.  You play as Blade Hunter, a private investigator and retired police officer.  After a designer drug kills the mayor's rebellious daughter, Chandra, Hunter is hired to find the people responsible for releasing the drug on the streets. What Blade ultimately finds is much more than he expected.  Rise of the Dragon combines classic point-and-click adventure style with platforming arcade sequences, giving a unique gameplay combination.
You’ll need the latest daily build of ScummVM and files from the DOS version of the game, which you can buy at GOG (check our wiki for the required data files).  Please file any issues you notice on our bug tracker.
>
articles.title: I don't need to remind you that this investigation is strictly unofficial

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (Kartik)
articles.description:
Unrest is a roleplaying game developed by Pyrodactyl Studios set in a fantasy interpretation of ancient India. You’ll step into the shoes of ordinary people and navigate a world fraught with challenges as they strive for safety, freedom, and peace.
We are proud to announce that Unrest is now playable using ScummVM thanks to the work done by our GSoC student, Kartik Agarwala! Help us test the game by grabbing a daily build of ScummVM. Read through our testing guidelines, and please take some screenshots along the way. If you encounter any issues, please report them to our bugtracker.
If you don’t own Unrest, you can purchase this game from either GOG or Steam. The demo for the game is also supported and available from our web site.
Now go, use your manipulative skills to bring peace to this troubled world where chaos is not afar. For the most daring players using the iron-man mode, saving and loading the game is only available using ScummVM's Global Main Menu.
>
articles.title: “Can you bring peace to.. UNREST?”

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Ve všech ohledech o trochu slabší než původní Gladiátor. Což znamená, že je to vlastně pořád dost kvalitní podívaná. Jestli jste z prvního filmu byli totálně nadšeni a chcete dalších 150 minut téhož, budete naprosto spokojeni. Já z něj totálně nadšený nebyl. (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Gladiátor 2 [Gladiator 2] - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Nevím, co je "legálně" zapotřebí k tomu, aby se mohl film nazývat "dokumentem", ale tohle působí jako zcela standardní nízkorozpočtový hraný film. Je to hořká komedie, která těží z atmosféry jednotlivých scén (velmi rozvláčných), aniž by měla jakýkoliv podstatný děj, směřující k nějakým pointám. (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Je to ve hvězdách - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dokument, který je profesionálně natočen, tzn. má tempo a atmosféru, je přehledný a dobře se na něj dívá. Co je to ale platné, když film zcela selhává v tom hlavním, tzn. v tom, aby nám nastínil, co se vlastně tehdy tomu děvčeti stalo a proč bychom se o to měli zajímat. Je nadhozeno několik navzájem si odporujících teorií (z nichž žádná není nijak překvapivá), nic se neprokáže, nic se neodhalí, a je konec. (Ilča 30 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Aneta - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Asi nejzajímavější "standardně natočený" dokument o architektuře, jaký jsem kdy viděl (a viděl jsem jich aspoň 10). Bez ohledu na to, jestli jste v té době žili nebo ne. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Architektura ČSSR 58-89 - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Vážení posluchači, chcete nás? Detailní informace viz audio níže.
articles.title: Naše seznamka, aneb "Už dost!"

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Dopadlo to plus mínus podle očekávání a je to (celkem pochopitelně) určeno hlavně lidem, kterým jméno "John Williams" říká málo nebo nic.
Odkazy na zmiňované podcasty: 


"The Baton" - https://open.spotify.com/show/3p3Gz7uALidExpdpinGpUD
"John Williams a konec filmové hudby" - https://www.fffilm.cz/2024/05/john-williams-konec-filmove-hudby.html
articles.title: Povídání o novém dokumentu "Music by John Williams" s Jakubem Červinkou

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Méně erudovaný divák si může říkat, že jde o vydařenou, profesionálně natočenou, nepřístupnou sexy komedii, která je místy (hlavně ke konci) dost divná a nějak skřípe. Více erudovaný divák si může říkat, že to je odvážná hra s žánry a možná dokonce i nastavování zrcadel něčemu. Každopádně je to originální zážitek, který skoro nenudí a vypadá až překvapivě výpravně (vzhledem k omezenému rozpočtu). (Ilča 100 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Anora - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Mylně jsem se domníval, že jdu na film o problematice eutanázie. Ale místo toho Toltékové, astrální cestování, život po životě, reinkarnace a Jaroslav Dušek. Hodně podobné jako "Tajemství a smysl života", ale o něco méně WTF a výrazně kratší. Každopádně velmi fádní a nudné, pokud od začátku nevěříte tomu, co je vám cpáno. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tajemství smrti - 30 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Zdaleka nelepší černobílé drama o íránských džudistkách v Gruzii, jaké jsem v životě viděl. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tatami - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film, ve kterém většinu času není vůbec jasné, jaká je zrovna motivace které postavy na plátně (např. jestli právě dělá vtip, nebo jestli se bojí o svůj život). To je jeho největší a soustavný problém, ale má i mnoho dalších, například arabské teroristy z "Návratu do budoucnosti" a pointu, spočívající v tom, že veřejnoprávní média vám non-stop lžou a vy jim to štastně žerete (což je pointa pravděpodobně nezamýšlená, protože film spoluprodukoval Český rozhlas). Je velmi smutné vidět dílo, na kterém pracovali lidi, o kterých víme, že jsou schopni vyprodukovat něco zajímavého, a výsledek dopadl takto strašlivě. (Ilča 10 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Výjimečný stav - 20 %
